name: Meme Makin' Monkeys! (Unfinished GMTK jam game)
name_original: Meme Makin' Monkeys! (Unfinished GMTK jam game)
description:
You conned convinced an investor to back your new startup idea.  Training monkeys to crank out the next viral meme sensations!  

Can you keep this barrel of monkeys under control?... or will it drive you bananas?
